001import javax.swing.BoxLayout;
002import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
003import javax.swing.JButton;
004import javax.swing.JFrame;
005import javax.swing.JLabel;
006import javax.swing.JPanel;
007import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
008import javax.swing.JTextArea;
009import javax.swing.JTextField;
010
011import java.awt.BorderLayout;
012import java.awt.Dimension;
013import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
014import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
015import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
016import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
017
018import java.net.URL;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020
021/**
022 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a
023 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
024 * 
025 * @author Michael Kolling and LIN Xingtong
026 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023) LIN Xingtong edited (2024)
027 */
028public class UserInterface implements ActionListener {
029    /** un moteur de jeu qui gere la fonctionnalite du jeu */
030    private GameEngine aEngine;
031    /** la fenetre principale de l'interface */
032    private JFrame aMyFrame;
033    /** la zone de texte pour l'entree de l'utilisateur */
034    private JTextField aEntryField;
035    /** la zone de texte pour la sortie du programme */
036    private JTextArea aLog;
037    /** permet d'afficher une image */
038    private JLabel aImage;
039    /** un tableau de boutons pour les directions */
040    private JButton[] aBtsGo;
041    /** un bouton pour revenir en arriere */
042    private JButton aBtBack;
043    /** un tableau contenant les directions possibles */
044    private String[] vDirections = { "North", "South", "West", "East", "Up", "Down" };
045
046    /**
047     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
048     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is needed.
049     * 
050     * @param pGameEngine The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
051     */
052    public UserInterface(final GameEngine pGameEngine) {
053        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
054        this.createGUI();
055    } // UserInterface(.)
056
057    /**
058     * Print out some text into the text area.
059     * 
060     * @param pText The text to print.
061     */
062    public void print(final String pText) {
063        this.aLog.append(pText);
064        this.aLog.setCaretPosition(this.aLog.getDocument().getLength());
065    } // print(.)
066
067    /**
068     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
069     * 
070     * @param pText The text to print.
071     */
072    public void println(final String pText) {
073        this.print(pText + "\n");
074    } // println(.)
075
076    /**
077     * Show an image file in the interface.
078     * 
079     * @param pImageName The name of the image file to display.
080     */
081    public void showImage(final String pImageName) {
082        String vImagePath = "Images/" + pImageName; // to change the directory
083        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(vImagePath);
084        if (vImageURL == null)
085            System.out.println("Image not found : " + vImagePath);
086        else {
087            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon(vImageURL);
088            this.aImage.setIcon(vIcon);
089            this.aMyFrame.pack();
090        }
091    } // showImage(.)
092
093    /**
094     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
095     * 
096     * @param pOnOff true to enable, false to disable.
097     */
098    public void enable(final boolean pOnOff) {
099        this.aEntryField.setEditable(pOnOff); // enable/disable
100        if (pOnOff) { // enable
101            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate(500); // cursor blink
102            this.aEntryField.addActionListener(this); // reacts to entry
103            for (int i = 0; i < vDirections.length; i++) {
104                this.aBtsGo[i].addActionListener(this);
105            }
106            this.aBtBack.addActionListener(this);
107        } else { // disable
108            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate(0); // cursor won't blink
109            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener(this); // won't react to entry
110            for (int i = 0; i < vDirections.length; i++) {
111                this.aBtsGo[i].removeActionListener(this);
112            }
113            this.aBtBack.removeActionListener(this);
114        }
115    } // enable(.)
116
117    /**
118     * Set up graphical user interface.
119     */
120    private void createGUI() {
121        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame("Le Secret du Chat"); // change the title !
122        this.aEntryField = new JTextField(34);
123
124        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
125        this.aLog.setEditable(false);
126        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane(this.aLog);
127        vListScroller.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(200, 200));
128        vListScroller.setMinimumSize(new Dimension(100, 100));
129
130        this.aImage = new JLabel();
131
132        JPanel vEastPanel = new JPanel();// ==> place buttons add
133        vEastPanel.setLayout(new BoxLayout(vEastPanel, BoxLayout.Y_AXIS));// BoxLayout vertical
134
135        this.aBtsGo = new JButton[vDirections.length];
136        for (int i = 0; i < vDirections.length; i++) {
137            this.aBtsGo[i] = new JButton(vDirections[i]);
138            vEastPanel.add(this.aBtsGo[i]);
139            this.aBtsGo[i].addActionListener(this);
140        }
141        Dimension vd = this.aBtsGo[1].getMaximumSize();
142        //car south est le plus long
143        for (int i = 0; i < vDirections.length; i++) {
144            if(i!=1)
145                this.aBtsGo[i].setMaximumSize(new Dimension(vd));
146        }
147
148        this.aBtBack = new JButton("Back");
149        vEastPanel.add(this.aBtBack);
150        this.aBtBack.addActionListener(this);
151        this.aBtBack.setMaximumSize(new Dimension(vd));
152
153        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
154        vPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout()); // ==> only five places
155        vPanel.add(this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH);
156        vPanel.add(vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER);
157        vPanel.add(this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
158        vPanel.add(vEastPanel, BorderLayout.EAST);
159
160        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add(vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
161
162        // add some event listeners to some components
163        this.aEntryField.addActionListener(this);
164
165        // to end program when window is closed
166        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
167                new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
168                    @Override
169                    public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE) {
170                        System.exit(0);
171                    }
172                });
173
174        this.aMyFrame.pack();
175        this.aMyFrame.setVisible(true);
176        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
177    } // createGUI()
178
179    /**
180     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
181     */
182    @Override
183    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
184        String vBtnName = pE.getActionCommand();
185        if (Arrays.asList(vDirections).contains(vBtnName)) {
186            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("go " + vBtnName.toLowerCase());
187        } else if (vBtnName.equals("Back")) {
188            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("back");
189        } else
190            this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
191    } // actionPerformed(.)
192
193    /**
194     * A command has been entered in the entry field.
195     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
196     */
197    private void processCommand() {
198        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
199        this.aEntryField.setText("");
200
201        this.aEngine.interpretCommand(vInput);
202    } // processCommand()
203} // UserInterface
